sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import abstract from '../../static/abstract.jpg' import art from '../../static/art.jpg' import wallArt from '../../static/wallArt.jpg' const ProjectSummary = ({project, initial}) => { return(
{project.authorFirstName} {project.authorSecondName} {initial}

{project.content}

{/* {project.title}

Posted by {project.authorFirstName} {project.authorSecondName}

*/ }

{project.createdAt.toDate().toLocaleDateString('indian', {year: "2-digit", month: "short", day: "numeric"})}

) } export default ProjectSummary
